description: This is due to the order the rows are returned in. Currently the code sorts the dicts in the test but against a non-unique column causing the data to still come out inconsistently. We should use a better key.
title: Test migration _post_downgrade_186 doesn't work with postgres

comments.content: This is due to the order the rows are returned in. Currently the code sorts the dicts in the test but against a non-unique column causing the data to still come out inconsistently. We should use a better key.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~joshua.hesketh

    rather than one which isn't unqiue.
